programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Shocked by her task, Daya tries her best to prevent herself from dancing. However, she fails to do so and begins to do 'garba'.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya panics when she hears that Sundarlal has gone missing. Soon, she tells Nattu Kaka to get her tickets to Ahmedabad.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal tries to find Sundarlal by calling his friends. However, Sundarlal seems to have vanished without a trace.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya is conflicted when Jethalal forces her to choose between himself and Sundarlal. Later, Daya enlists Tapu's help to sneak Sundarlal around.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya is nervous about Jethalal finding Sundarlal hidden in their house. Later, Jethalal becomes suspicious when Daya is eager for him to leave.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal catches a peek of Sundarlal in his kitchen and assumes it is a burglar. Soon, the rest of Gokuldham Society panics and begins searching for the supposed criminal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Zorawar is on the lookout for Sundarlal and hunts all over the society. However, Sundarlal dresses up as a housemaid to evade capture.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sundarlal dresses up as a woman to disguise himself. However, chaos ensues when the other residents assume Sundarlal is Popatlal's girlfriend.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Holi celebrations continue in full swing. Meanwhile, Zorawar and his men hunt for Sundarlal all over Gokuldham Society.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Champaklal's feet hurt, Jethalal and Tapu fight over helping him. Later, Jethalal feels embarrassed in front of Babita.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal's phone stops functioning and he tries various techniques to fix the problem. Later, he decides to purchase a smartphone from Jethalal's store.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal is keen on buying his new phone as per the auspicious time given by the priest. At the shop, he harasses Jethalal a lot over selecting the phone.

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: Dr Salunkhe manages to save Daya's life by performing an emergency medical procedure. Later, the CID team finds a dead body inside the vault and discover an entrance to a long tunnel.

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: Sanjana is asked to surrender the mysterious briefcase because of which she was kidnapped. Meanwhile, Daya manages to save Abhijeet in the nick of time.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: A dejected Jethalal plans to take his family to Lonavala when Babita does not invite him to her birthday party. But when Babita learns the truth she confronts Iyer about the error.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Daya excitedly rush to get the perfect gift for Babita's birthday party. On the other hand, Babita and Iyer's grand party begins in full swing.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Daya reach right on time for Babita's bash and learn that they failed to get the perfect gift for her. Later, Champaklal attends the party and feels horrified to find Daya in a dress.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal learns that Jethalal wants to go to Sanghvi's birthday party and scolds him for desiring to leave his family to stay out late at night.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal humiliates Jethalal in public for coming home late. Later, Jethalal begins to resent him for overreacting to a small mistake.

programme.desc: Comedian Kapil Sharma interacts with celebrity guests about their latest films while keeping the audience laughing with his wit, humour and assorted skits.

programme.title: The Kapil Sharma Show

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone in Gokuldham is annoyed by the loud noises of the renovation process, and they try to find a quiet and peaceful area to relax.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents discuss whether Taarak should write the article. Tapu Sena and Champaklal plan a surprise party for Gokuldham's residents.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While the Gokuldham residents are asleep, trucks honk in front of their houses.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Gogi refuses to go to school and tries to run away from everyone. Bhide annoys Champaklal with his actions.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Taarak tries to help Roshan out of a predicament when she has to urgently go out of town. A comical argument takes place at Gada Electronics.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone at the Gokuldham society tries to give love and warmth to Gogi, in the absence of his parents.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bagha wants to play with Gogi and brings toys for him, but Jethalal becomes irritated by their noise.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone feels annoyed by Gogi's noisy toys, but he innocently challenges Champaklal with a thoughtful question.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The Gadas find it difficult to handle Gogi. Iyer and Jethalal share their respective experiences of dealing with Gogi and his antics.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone in the Gokuldham society becomes shocked after knowing that Gogi loses his student card before an exam.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bagha and Natu Kaka enjoy themselves at work at the expense of Jethalal. The Tapu Sena learn a new type of game on their way back from school.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The Tapu Sena agree to lie about going to an extra class. However, Sonu is reluctant and wants to come clean with her parents.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The parents in Gokuldham get worried when the Tapu Sena do not return home on time. The kids spend time having fun.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The Tapu Sena lie about studying, making their parents proud that they care so much about education. However, they are exposed when Bhide gets a call from the principal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The parents decide to not tell the Tapu Sena they have learned the truth and continue to treat them nicely.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu Sena get into a big fight with Nandu. Sodhi, Jethalal, Dr Hatthi, Taarak, Bhide, and Popatlal go looking for them in Nandu's area.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Inspector Chalu Pandey, Jethalal, Dr Hatthi, Bhide, Taarak, and Popatlal look for Nandu. A kid in the area helps direct the police to Tapu Sena.

programme.desc: Tapu Sena returns from the camp and meets with Champaklal to share stories of their numerous adventures and shed light on the various new activities they learnt there.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal's morning gets disrupted by hiccups until Nattu Kaka announces a piece of shocking news. On the other hand, reporter Rita meets Tapu Sena and offers them a role in a TV advertisement.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu Sena's parents feel overjoyed when they get an invite for a TV advertisement. So, they all display their acting skills while providing tips to the children.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: On the audition day, the parents are refrained from attending but Sodhi feels determined to go. Meanwhile, when Tapu Sena reaches the audition their confidence plummets due to the strict director.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After the auditions conclude, the Gokuldham society members head home. Daya notices Sodhi's happiness over the audition.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Gogi does not get selected for the advertisement, Roshan creates a ruckus in Gokuldham. Meanwhile, Tapu Sena excitedly sets off for their very first advertisement.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu Sena successfully completes shooting for their first advertisement. On the other hand, Gogi has a hard time accepting his rejection from the advertisement.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya feels excited about her son's appearance in the advertisement and contacts everyone. She eventually comes up with a plan to view the ad with her friends.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone panics when the electricity goes off right before Tapu Sena's advertisement releases on TV. Sodhi saves the day and successfully restores the electricity.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Tapu Sena receives undivided attention for featuring in the advertisement, Gogi gets upset. So, Tapu promises to make the little boy famous.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Tapu's plan to make Gogi famous fails, he proposes one last devious plot.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: According to their plan, Tapu Sena approaches Roshan and Sodhi to call Gogi to play with them. However, when the couple discover that their son is missing, they create a ruckus.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of a housing society help each other find solutions when they face common real-life challenges and get involved in sticky situations.

programme.title: Gatha Shiv Parivaar Ki Ganesh Kartikey
programme.desc: Amidst divine challenges, Lord Shiva and Parvati, along with their sons Ganesha and Kartikeya, explore the dynamics of love, sacrifice, and family bonds.
